DataElement.preferredName: Resin-Based Composite Therapy Standard Performed Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A yes/no indicator related to resinous material designed to be applied to prevent occlusal decay by filling in the fissures and/or crevices of the tooth as regular use.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to resinous material designed to be applied to prevent occlusal decay by filling in the fissures and/or crevices of the tooth as regular use.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A dental restorative material made up of disparate or separate parts (e.g., resin and quartz particles).:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: A dental restorative material made up of disparate or separate parts (e.g., resin and quartz particles).
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Property.preferredDefinition: Regularly and widely used.:Performed; carried out.

Concepts.definition: Executed and carried through to completion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

DataElementConcept.origin: PEARL CRF:Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.description: Would a resin-based composite restoration be the standard of care for the lesion(s)
